title: The.Walking.Dead.Season.2.Episode 1 and 2-R.G.Mechanics

System requirements

Operating system: Windows 7 
Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.3 Ghz or equivalent 
Memory: 3 GB 
Video Card: ATI or NVidia card 1024 MB RAM 
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0 
Free space on hard disk: 2 GB 

Game information

In the game The Walking Dead: Season 2 continues the story of Clementine, 
a girl orphaned by invasion of the undead. Forced to take care of herself, 
she learns to survive in a crazy world. Many months have passed since the 
events of The Walking Dead: Season 1, and Clementine is trying to secure 
safety. But as a normal child can survive when the living is no better and 
sometimes worse than dead? Playing as Clementines, you will encounter 
situations and dilemmas, test your moral qualities and the survival instinct. 
In this sequel to one of the best games of 2012 your decisions and actions 
change history 

Repack Features

Do not cut/Recoded
Episode 1 - All that remains 
Episode 2 - Between two fires
Repack by R.G.Mechanics
